issue.title: [Python] Accidentally calling pyarrow.Table() should not segfault process
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-970](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-970). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While we need not go crazy with null-pointer checks, the code that gets executed by `repr(pyarrow.Table())` should result in a more helpful error message
